document_data.mainbody:
Rivrel was an apprentice of Maerjanthra Shalace in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Rivrel almost never spoke.
In Narnra Shalaces recollection, her mother, Maerjanthra Shalace, had five apprentices Goraun, Rorgel, Jonczer, Tantheld, and Rivrel. She learned that at least one of them believed her mother to be a literal dragon. Other than Rivrel, she could not confirm that any of them were dead, knowing only they disappeared after her mothers death.
